metadata.description:
The official adaptation of G.I. Joe: Rise of Cobra! G.I. JOE is a highly trained, classified special operations unit composed of men and women from around the globe. Officially, these warriors don't even exist. Few know the truth that G.I. JOE fights a secret war, as the first and last line of defense against forces that seek to plunge our world into chaos. Wherever there's trouble G.I. JOE is there.
NOW YOU KNOW, AND KNOWING IS HALF THE BATTLE.
metadata.name: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra Official Movie Adaptation
